column4: anyone know the packages required to send files to computer from phone over bluetooth
I think one is already installed, check add/remove software
well i've searched for bluetooth stuff but i'm not sure what i need to allow computer to recieve files over bluetooth
there's a bunch of stuff up in add/remove programs for bluetooth
just make sure you have "all available applications" enabled
i dont think i have add/remove programs
it's at the bottom of the 'applications' menu
so once i'm there what do i do?
I found something like 7 or so apps
yeah i think i see it, bluetooth file sharing
I have no idea, you just gotta try em out to see what works  :D
